patthana14.37:4.1: Saraṇaṃ dhammaṃ paṭicca nasaraṇo dhammo uppajjati hetupaccayā.
patthana14.37:4.2: Saraṇaṃ dhammaṃ paṭicca naaraṇo dhammo uppajjati hetupaccayā.
patthana14.37:4.3: Saraṇaṃ dhammaṃ paṭicca nasaraṇo ca naaraṇo ca dhammā uppajjanti hetupaccayā. #3
patthana14.37:5.1: Araṇaṃ dhammaṃ paṭicca naaraṇo dhammo uppajjati hetupaccayā. #1
patthana14.37:6.1: Saraṇañca araṇañca dhammaṃ paṭicca nasaraṇo dhammo uppajjati hetupaccayā. #1
patthana14.37:7.1: Hetuyā pañca, ārammaṇe dve … pe … vipāke ekaṃ … pe … avigate pañca.
patthana14.37:10.1: Saraṇaṃ dhammaṃ paṭicca naaraṇo dhammo uppajjati nahetupaccayā. #1
patthana14.37:11.1: Araṇaṃ dhammaṃ paṭicca nanaaraṇo dhammo uppajjati nahetupaccayā.
patthana14.37:12.1: Nahetuyā dve, na ārammaṇe tīṇi, naadhipatiyā pañca … pe … napurejāte cattāri … pe … nakamme dve … pe … naāhāre naindriye najhāne namagge ekaṃ … pe … navippayutte dve … pe … novigate tīṇi.
patthana14.37:13.1: (Sahajātavārampi paccayavārampi nissayavārampi saṃsaṭṭhavārampi sampayuttavārampi paṭiccavārasadisaṃ vitthāretabbaṃ.)
patthana14.37:14.1: Saraṇo dhammo nasaraṇassa dhammassa hetupaccayena paccayo.
patthana14.37:14.2: Saraṇo dhammo naaraṇassa dhammassa hetupaccayena paccayo.
patthana14.37:14.3: Saraṇo dhammo nasaraṇassa ca naaraṇassa ca dhammassa hetupaccayena paccayo. #3
patthana14.37:15.1: Araṇo dhammo nasaraṇassa dhammassa hetupaccayena paccayo. #1
patthana14.37:16.1: Saraṇo dhammo nasaraṇassa dhammassa ārammaṇapaccayena paccayo.
patthana14.37:16.2: Saraṇo dhammo naaraṇassa dhammassa ārammaṇapaccayena paccayo.
patthana14.37:17.1: Hetuyā cattāri, ārammaṇe cattāri, adhipatiyā pañca, anantare cattāri … pe … sahajāte pañca, aññamaññe dve, nissaye satta, upanissaye cattāri, purejāte pacchājāte āsevane dve, kamme cattāri, vipāke ekaṃ, āhāre … pe … magge cattāri, sampayutte dve, vippayutte tīṇi … pe … avigate satta.
patthana14.37:18.1: Saraṇo dhammo nasaraṇassa dhammassa ārammaṇapaccayena paccayo, sahajātapaccayena paccayo, upanissayapaccayena paccayo, pacchājātapaccayena paccayo, kammapaccayena paccayo.
patthana14.37:19.1: Saraṇo dhammo naaraṇassa dhammassa ārammaṇapaccayena paccayo, sahajātapaccayena paccayo, upanissayapaccayena paccayo.
patthana14.37:20.1: Nahetuyā satta, naārammaṇe satta, naadhipatiyā satta, naanantare satta … pe … nasahajāte pañca, naaññamaññe nanissaye pañca … pe … napurejāte cha … pe … nasampayutte pañca, navippayutte cattāri … pe … noavigate cattāri.
